name: Hardcore Frogkour
description:
WebGL Version: https://cornerpoint.itch.io/hardcore-frogkour-webgl

Hardcore Frogkour is a micro-sized Platformer where you play as a frog who must retrieve and return gems throughout 15 levels. Swinging around with your tongue is the only form of mobility. Walking or jumping is not allowed here! Make sure you chain  swings to achieve high speeds.  Now grab those gems and get the heck back!

P.s. sorry for the lack of content, college had me working hard. ,_, 

Thank you Biruhan for helping me out with the music.
